6.name: Payment Module x1
6.request:
SELECT COUNT(distinct m.id_module) FROM PREFIX_hook h LEFT JOIN PREFIX_hook_module hm ON h.id_hook = hm.id_hook LEFT JOIN PREFIX_module m ON hm.id_module = m.id_module
WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

SELECT IFNULL(id_order, 0) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_address a ON o.id_address_delivery = a.id_address LEFT JOIN PREFIX_country c ON c.id_country = a.id_country WHERE o.valid = 1 AND a.id_country != "{config}PS_COUNTRY_DEFAULT{/config}" AND c.iso_code IN (
"CA",
"GL",
"PM",
"US"
)

359.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_order_state os ON os.id_order_state = o.current_state WHERE o.module like "%ebay%" AND os.logable = 1 AND o.date_add > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)

471.request: SELECT COUNT( id_module ) FROM PREFIX_module WHERE `name` like "%netreviews%"

472.name: Module netreviews configured
472.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_configuration WHERE (( name LIKE 'NETREVIEWS_CONFIGURATION_OK') AND ( value = '1')) OR (( name LIKE 'AVISVERIFIES_URLCERTIFICAT ') AND ( value IS NOT LIKE '%preprod%'))

475.name: Module bluesnap installed
475.request: SELECT COUNT( id_module ) FROM PREFIX_module WHERE `name` like "%bluesnap%"

476.name: Module bluesnap configured
476.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_configuration WHERE (( name LIKE 'BLUESNAP_CONFIGURATION_OK') AND ( value = '1')) OR (( name LIKE 'BLUESNAP_SANDBOX ') AND ( value NOT LIKE '%sandbox%'))

477.name: Module bluensap active
477.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_order_state os ON os.id_order_state = o.current_state WHERE o.module like "%bluesnap%" AND os.logable = 1

478.name: Module bluesnap superactive
478.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_order_state os ON os.id_order_state = o.current_state WHERE o.module like "%bluesnap%" AND os.logable = 1 AND o.date_add > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)

479.request: SELECT COUNT( id_module ) FROM PREFIX_module WHERE `name` like "%desjardins%"

advices_lang_16.html:
Are you sure?

Let us help you turn email into the #1 driver of growth for your eCommerce shop.

Are you sure?

Criteo Product Ads attracts new traffic and reengages previous website visitors

Are you sure?

Create a UPS account in the Official UPS extension and get shipping discounts

Are you sure?

Bolster sales and connect with your customers using MailChimp’s powerful tools. Configura ahora

Are you sure?

Identify and prevent order fraud and ad fraud. Easy to setup. Configure now

Are you sure?

Easily manage your email, newsletter and SMS campaigns with one single interface

Are you sure?

Sign up to Skrill for simple, fast and secure cross – border payments

Are you sure?

Offer customer financing and increase your average order by 33%. Configure now!

Tips of the day

Give something valuable for FREE to boost your eCommerce

Giveaways help buyers get aware of your product, give you access to their contacts and thirdly the psychological principle of reciprocity-people pay when they get something for free!

Learn More!

Tips of the day

AdScale - Win the Ecommerce Race with AI Advertising

AdScale weaves the power of AI technology into your advertising by automatically creating and optimizing ads across Google, Facebook & Instagram, with an average ROI of 10X!

Learn more

Tips of the day

Did you know that brands who use product reviews in their abandoned cart emails, experience 5% to 15% increases in their recovery rate?

Did you know that brands who use product reviews in their abandoned cart emails, experience 5% to 15% increases in their recovery rate?

More information?

Tips of the day

Did you know Clearbanc can provide fast, affordable capital to D2C brands?

The holiday season is coming up faster than you think! Now's the time to start lining up extra funding to fuel your marketing budget and inventory, so you're set up for success.

Learn More!

Tips of the day

Boost engagement and revenue by learning more about your audience

Create personalized, relevant emails that target your audience based on demographic data like gender and age.

See How MailChimp Can Help
Tips of the day

Sell more stuff by rewarding loyal customers

Reward your best customers with an automated email series containing special coupons or other exclusive offers, and get almost 5x more orders per recipient than regular bulk email.

Start Thanking Your Customers
Tips of the day

Boost sales by reminding customers about items they’ve left behind

67% of online shopping carts are abandoned before checkout. Abandoned cart emails help you follow up with people who navigate away from their cart and convince them to finish their purchase.

Start Recapturing Lost Sales

Tips of the day

93% of consumers will add products to their cart to receive free shipping.

Shipping should be part of your marketing strategy, especially since 58% of people abandon carts with shipping charges. Use free shipping to increase sales and stand out from competition.

Learn more

Tips of the day

New: SEO Sitemap Generator (XML & HTML) module

With the new SEO sitemap generator SEO module developed by PrestaShop, create your store's sitemaps with just one click!

Find out more
